message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $18,000. Can we meet in the middle at $19,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $19,000 is still below what I had in mind. How about we settle at $19,500? This reflects the product's true value.
I understand the product's value, but $19,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $19,000 and $19,500, which would be $19,250. Can we discuss this further?
